Over 10+ dungeons! 728 maps, 732 items Random item system PvP ranks based on killstreak Unique slayer tasks Fully dynamic minigames Perfected Glacor combat Seamless Flask making Timed world events Unique item repairing system Rewards for answering timed trivias Vote4Rewards with BONUS point gain! Vote point shop NO DUPES Staking (no dupes and glitches) PvM point system Skill point system All skills trainable! Point conversion system Troll Invasion 3 Custom bosses! Lavaflow Mines Artisan workshop Livid Farm (cr: Fuzen Seth) Skill "tasks" Achivement system Player-owned housing Pest Control Experience boosting auras and items Upgrading and enchanting Ruby bolt enchanting Stardust system for upgrading Warrior's guild Stable playerbase 90% RuneScape Droptables Pest Control alternative for void Custom minigames! Trained staff team Unique title selection system Close to RuneScape dungeoneering! Random item system Dominion Tower ++ rewards Multilcannons, claws, everything obtainable through PvM and voting! Not P2W! Everything can be achieved manually! Many co-operative minigames All 3 types of dwarf multicannons. Unique Content Multicannons disabled in instanced areas! Perfected PlayerCombat 100% random point gain system! Custom Minigames Queen Black Dragon Warrior's Guild Custom Quests! Fairy Rings 20+ Commands Glacors with element weakness Active, growing community! Dedicated development team Active Staff Constant updates Loyalty System Prestiging Tiers Magic Whistle system Quick and safe donation system Unique Loyalty points shop for dedicated players Fully working web-based highscores and signature cards Construction w/ dynamic region Custom combat system with "anger" and "fear" Open world PvP areas Player stabilization system 100% Potion Decanting system Polypore dungeon Auto-pick up item system Polypore creation 100% Glacor dungeon with boosts and minions Element system Soul wars Timed random spawns for bonus points Hunger Games F.O.G[/b]
